numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed a fact about some sports leagues.
2. The NFL is a sports league.
3. The WNBA is a sports league.
4. The NBA is a sports league.
5. The MLS is a sports league.
6. In the NFL, a majority of the players are people of color.
7. In the WNBA, a majority of the players are people of color.
8. In the NBA, a majority of the players are people of color.
9. In the MLS, a majority of the players are people of color.
10. The MLB is a sports league.
11. In the MLB, 40% of the players are people of color.
12. In these sports leagues, a majority of the head coaches are not people of color.
13. In the NFL, 13% of the head coaches are people of color.
14. In the MLS, 41% of the head coaches are people of color.
15. The NFL has the smallest percentage of head coaches of color among these leagues.
16. The MLS has the largest percentage of head coaches of color among these leagues.
17. I wonder why in some sports there are many players of color.
18. I wonder why in some sports there are fewer coaches of color.
19. I am a person of color.
20. This situation has an impact on me.
21. This situation shows that there is diversity in sports.
22. This situation shows that race is not a deciding factor for joining a sports team.
23. This graph shows the percentage of players of color in sports leagues.
24. This graph shows the percentage of head coaches of color in sports leagues.
25. A good name for this graph is "The Percentage of Diversity in Sports Leagues".
